Event List

{{event.name}}
MM/DD/YYYY import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RepositoryService } from 'app/repository-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event', templateUrl: './event.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event.component.css'] }) export class EventComponent { constructor(private repositoryService: RepositoryService) { } events: any; eventID: string = ""; name: string=""; description: string = ""; price: number = 0.00; location: string = ""; date: string = "2/27/2023" ngOnInit(): void { this.repositoryService.getEvents().subscribe( (response) => { this.events = response; }); } }
